name: Wall Climber!
description:
This project was created through the Games and Interactive Media major at Azusa Pacific University. Made by Christian Duran.

"Wall Climber!" is a pixel-art 2D platformer where you could hang and climb on walls! Survive 5 dangerous levels, and escape the dark cave! 

CLIMBING CONTROLS:

Run against a wall to hang on a wall.

To climb slow, press SPACEBAR when hanging on a wall. 

To climb fast, only push SPACEBAR when against a wall. Do NOT hang when trying to jump to climb fast!
